job.title: Staff Software Engineer, Android SDK
job.description: At PayPal NASDAQ PYPL we believe that every person has the right to participate fully in the global economy Our mission is to democratize financial services to ensure that everyone regardless of background or economic standing has access to affordable convenient and secure products and services to take control of their financial lives Were a purposedriven company and our beliefs are the foundation of how we conduct business every day Were guided by our core values of Inclusion Innovation Collaboration and Wellness Collectively these values inspire us to work together as One Team with our customers at the center of everything we do and to take care of ourselves each other and the communities in which we live and work We challenge the status quo ask questions and find solutions Join us as we enable the hopes dreams and ambitions of millions of people around the worldbrbrstrongJob Description SummarybrstrongThe PayPal SDK and Integrations team is seeking to reinvent the way we pay online Our team is responsible for enabling millions of merchants around the world to accept payments within their mobile apps and websites We always keep developers and their needs at the top of our mind and strive to provide the bestinclass developer experience We are looking for a passionate highly talented selfdriven and proven Android Engineer  to join our team In this role you will be developing and enabling new payment methods and features for PayPals Android SDK You will play a pivotal role in designing and building the next generation of PayPals developer experience You will be responsible for building and delivering features for PayPals Android SDK maintaining and contributing to open source evangelizing and engaging with external developers Were looking for someone who is eager to learn and able to master many technologies and has a strong focus on empathizing and understanding what developers needbrbrstrongJob DescriptionbrstrongstronguWhat Youll Be Doingbrustrongulli Developing and enabling new payment methods and features through PayPals Android SDKlili Working with stakeholders across PayPal to create a simple robust Android SDK that enables all PayPal has to offerlili Partnering closely with cross functional partners in design and productlili Providing feedback on code and contributing to architecture discussionslili Engaging with internal and external developers to better understand developer pain points and ways to improve the developer experiencebrbrliulstronguRequirementsbrustrongulli 3 years of work experience in developing Android applicationslili Comfortable working with Kotlin Java Android Studio Maven Coroutines and modern Android best practiceslili Experience in developerfacing products eg SDKs REST APIs GraphQL or products that enable thirdparty application development are great to have but not requiredlili Excited about our teams focus on open source and improving developer experienceslili Experience working in an Agile environmentlili Keep up to date on industry trends and technologies and apply them to our productsbrbrliulstrongHow we work brstrongulli Communication is key to our process and we dont want to hinder it with walls We work directly with other teamslili Engineers build test release and monitor their own codelili We pair program often We believe that we do our best work when we work and collaborate togetherlili We default to async communication and call for meetings when necessarylili We hold daily standups and have regular retrospectives to discuss things that are going well and opportunities for improvementslili We value unique perspectives brought by diverse backgrounds and experiences A broad range of ideas and perspectives help us to create the best possible productbrbrliulstrongTypes of projects we work on brstrongulli We do a lot of opensource development as our SDKs are in public GitHub We also contribute to other opensource projectslili We own PayPals SDKs which are the primary way for a merchant to accept payments in their Websites and Mobile appslili We are launching new and interesting ways to pay through the SDKslili We create easytouse developer tools that supplement our SDKs and Integrationslili We are focused on improving the developer experience by engaging with the external developer community creating tutorials blogs and speaking at conferences brbrliulstrongOther cultural aspects brstrongulli Open dev days every two weeks we spend a day working on projects that interest us and help us expand our skills and knowledgelili Participation in the technology community we help cover travel and attendance costs for conferences and we offer opportunities and tools for speakingbrbrliulFor more than 20 years PayPal
